Name: Curious Alice

Follow the guidance of your own personal White Rabbit companion, all the while attempting to find missing objects, solve the Caterpillar's mind-bending riddles, visit the Queen of Heartsâ€™ croquet garden, while experiencing more classic moments from this legendary tale.
